long_description: Built with cooling mesh side panels and moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable, the men's Nike Printed Miler T-Shirt is ready for your toughest runs. Dri-FIT recycled polyester fabric delivers high-tech moisture management to keep you cool, and it dries quickly and feels soft against your skin. Mesh side panels increase breathability; raglan sleeves enhance freedom of motion. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light, and a reflective loop on center back manages your earphones cord. Nike Printed Miler T-Shirt incorporates flatlock seams for flexibility and comfort.
short_description: Built with cooling mesh side panels and moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable, the men's Nike Printed Miler T-Shirt is ready for your toughest runs.
